hero.headline: A fast NO activation flow you can feel.

mechanism.title: The Mechanism
mechanism.subtitle: What happens inside your body after intake

intake.title: Intake
intake.description: Right after intake, the precursor flow that opens the NO pathway begins.

conversion.title: Conversion
conversion.description: The conversion steps toward NO progress quickly.

vessel.title: Vessel Response
vessel.description: Vessels relax, allowing flow to widen.

flow.title: Flow & Warmth
flow.description: Peripheral circulation changes can be felt as warmth.

sustain.title: Sustain
sustain.description: Your body aligns toward a steadier flow rhythm.

bloodPressure.title: Blood Pressure
bloodPressure.description: Average change after 15 min: Systolic -16 / Diastolic -13 mmHg

timing.q: When can I feel the effects?
timing.a: Individual results vary, but many users feel warmth or improved circulation within 5-15 minutes after intake.

howToTake.q: How and when should I take it?
howToTake.a: Mix one stick with 200ml of water. We recommend taking it on an empty stomach in the morning or before exercise.

daily.q: Should I take it every day?
daily.a: For optimal results, we recommend taking it regularly every day.

mealTiming.q: Should I take it on an empty stomach? Can I take it after meals?
mealTiming.a: Taking it on an empty stomach allows for faster absorption, but you can also take it after meals.

caution.a: If you are taking blood pressure medication or have specific health conditions, please consult your doctor before use.

normalResponse.a: Warmth, mild facial flushing, and sensation of vessel dilation are normal NO activation responses.
